name: Play When Violent
description:
(first build was wrong, sorry we new to git. It is correct now. The unityDLL is in PlayWhenViolent-CorrectBuild\PlayWhenViolent-CorrectBuild ) 

Backtrace game jam 4, we used some premade assets with proper permissions. 

Mouse and WASD to move. Play when you're angry to calm down and track your calmness with our convenient very early stages "aggression tracker" within your Zen island. From this island do mini games to ease your nerves, from feeding your local fish to raking leaves.(and mega Tetris(forever, XL, number 9 large). 

We sincerely hope you enjoy our very polished epic UI's and fade durations <3
